scripts.comment: Edit the custom block on the left to view the problem!
The script below is one example how to use the block. This example performs a simple check that it cycles through the numbers more than once.

block.l: Please enter a binary number to use for a pattern:

scripts.comment: The script below is a more fun application of this block. Given a binary number, such as "1011", it will repeat this pattern and draw it across the stage!
Can you extend the above script to draw the pattern vertically after drawing horizontally? What other patterns could you draw?
